The 81st Infantry Division (, 81-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army.
Organization
*1st Brigade
**321st Infantry Regiment
**322nd Infantry Regiment
*2nd Brigade
**323rd Infantry Regiment
**324th Infantry Regiment
